column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////In a city of great restaurant choices
column2: Bavette's is a stand-out.  The smoky paneled walls make you feel like you are dining in a library.  They make a mean Old Fashioned
column3: which is always a nice way to start out.  The meal is one of the best we've had in the last two years.  We started with a fois gras terrine and tomato salad
column4: then had amazing steaks for our main courses.  A side of corn and a side of bacon made the meal perfect.  On top of it all
column6: knowledgeable and professional  Can't recommend Bavette's highly enough!
